Uses of Class
View.BoardGUI

Packages that use BoardGUI
Controller   
 

Uses of BoardGUI in Controller
 

Methods in Controller with parameters of type BoardGUI
static void Controller.controller(Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP, BoardGUI game)
          Observer: Controls the flow of the game and updates the GUI of the game
post-conditions: Rolls the Dice of the Player P1 and then updates his pawn and call the methods Position_Setup, end_turn, Sunday_Match.
static void Controller.end_turn(Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP, BoardGUI game)
          Observer:Ends the turn of the player whose playing
post-condition:Calls the turn_Player and calls is_Finished if the Players have finished the game.
static void Controller.Position_Setup(BoardGUI game, Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP)
          Observer: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player
post-condition: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player (Moves the Cards to the Players hand, finds his new MovePosition, updates the Players, infoBox and Jackpot, throws the Cards from the Players hand to the Pile)
